Package net.minecraft.world.entity

Enum Class MobCategory

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<net.minecraft.world.entity.MobCategory>
net.minecraft.world.entity.MobCategory
All Implemented Interfaces:
StringRepresentable
public enum MobCategory  extends Enum<MobCategory> implements StringRepresentable
Represents a category for a {pkg}.Mob entity.

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    AMBIENT
    An entity that is usually aesthetical and provides no significant functionality.
    AXOLOTLS
    An axolotl mob.
    CREATURE
    An entity with simple ai.
    MISC
    A miscellaneous mob.
    MONSTER
    A hostile mob that usually attacks the player.
    UNDERGROUND_WATER_CREATURE
    A water creature that spawns underground.
    WATER_AMBIENT
    An ambient water creature.
    WATER_CREATURE
    A water creature that spawns in the water.
